r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * Released and then pulled 0.20.0, borked the Xhtml renderers (were Plain, not Xhtml) * Added new renderer "Plain" to render a non-marked-up version of the wiki text. You should disable the Translatehtml rule to avoid HTML entities in your plain text. * License change; now uses LGPL, not PHP license
